descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# **SolarBlack – Rhythm Combat Evolved**

**Slice. Shoot. Strike. Sweat.**

SolarBlack is a high-intensity VR-exclusive action-rhythm game where you slice and shoot to the beat to take down an otherworldly threat.
Train your body and mind in sync with handcrafted soundtracks across immersive, reactive worlds.


🌀 Flextime: Slow time, plan your attacks, and strike with cinematic precision

💪 5 Difficulty Levels: Whether you're a rhythm rookie or a timing master

🎵 22 Original Tracks: A custom soundtrack crafted to match every moment

🌌 36+ Environments: Some may look very familiar

🥊 3 Game Modes:

- Boxing-style fitness combat

- Stationary SaberGun rhythm duels

- Full movement levels through surreal environments

🏆 Achievements & Collectibles: Keep coming back for more

# Saber Guns
[media]
The first VR game to fuse dual-wielding saber combat and rhythmic gunplay into a single seamless, beat-driven fighting style.
Paired with a dynamic, original soundtrack and surreal, pulsing worlds that react to every move.



# Flextime
[media]
Channel your inner slow-motion hero.
Flextime lets you freeze the action, catch your breath, and deliver flawless combos with surgical precision.


# Fitness Mode
[media]
SolarBlack isn’t just fun. It’s a workout.
Activate Fitness Mode to turn every beat into a punch. Precision earns points, power makes you sweat.
It’s the most fun you’ll ever have burning calories.
